name: GMOatmeal - The curse of Curry Bear
name_original: GMOatmeal - The curse of Curry Bear
description:
Play the game witch sound on (preferably headphones)

Controls
  • W A S D - move
  • Space - Jump
  • Shift - Sprint
  • Ctrl - Crouch
  • Left Mouse - attack
  • Right Mouse - Swing
Game

You are playing as a soldier on a helicopter and out of nowhere a bear with a jetpack belt appears. The proffesional you are, you take him down with your fists but in turn the bear crashes into the helicopter and the rest is up to YOU.

This game was made during the Brakeys Game Jam 2022.2 by:

https://paddegroda.itch.io and https://kapoter1447.itch.io
